duties_responsibilities.duty: Clean property business office, restrooms, laundry rooms, model apartments, and property common areas on a defined schedule.
Clean vacant apartment units in preparation for showing and occupancy.
Responsible for the overall upkeep of the property landscape and the exterior image.
Address the concerns and maintenance needs of residents in a friendly and professional manner.
Reports maintenance problems to the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, Trade, Technical, or Vocational school
